comments: Absolutely an amazing choral director! He inspires me to keep on singing! If you love to sing, I highly recommend you to take this class! Loved his style of teaching and engaging with the students! Really helpful when someone asks for help! I look forward to attending this class!
Fantasic teacher. His energy is contagious, and his love for what he does rubs off on everybody. He\'s very respectful and cares about his students.

Wow. Dr P is in many ways the best choral director I\'ve sung under. He\'s kind and easy-going, yet works hard and inspires his singers to do the same. Singing under his direction has been very enjoyable and helped me grow as a musician. I highly recommend him!
one word: AMAZING!!! he really makes it fun and helps out so much. he is wonderful and fun and if you like to sing and want to be in any of the choirs. take him. he is amazing!!!!!
Dr. Peterson is an amazing choral professor and comes to class ready to teach. He is also very eager to help anyone who wishes to be part of the class. He also looks like Tony Stark!
Teaches you how to teach and requires you to think, not just attend class...but it\'s fun to be in the class.
